name: Precipitation-runoff and storage data
description: Precipitation-runoff and storage data for Star Creek watershed.

citation.text: Spencer, S.A., Silins, U., & Anderson, A.E. Precipitaton-runoff and storage dynamics in watersheds underlain by till and permeable bedrock in Alberta's Rocky Mountains. Water Resources Research. In Review.

distribution.name: Annual average precipitation.tab
distribution.description: Area weighted precipitation for Star Creek watershed.

distribution.name: Dynamic storage.tab
distribution.description: Dynamic storage calculated by the water balance method for Star West and Star East sub-watersheds.

distribution.name: Event rise.csv
distribution.description: Event rise is the difference in specific discharge at the start of a precipitation event and specific discharge at the peak of the event. Event rise is calculated for dry and wet periods.

distribution.name: Hillslope wells.csv
distribution.description: Water table dynamics for three hillslope wells in Star Creek and daily precipitation data for the matching time period.

distribution.name: Recession analysis.csv
distribution.description: Recession slopes and average discharge for night hours, on days with no rain, in July and August for four sub-watersheds in Star Creek watershed.

distribution.name: Winter precip-runoff ratios.csv
distribution.description: Winter precipitation and runoff dynamics for dry and wet autumns (seasonal antecedent conditions).
